question: Are you ready to embark upon the "biggest" journey of your lifeâ€¦ that of the head to the HEART?
Is Plenitude part of your daily life?
Do you welcome and embrace the circumstances that life presents to you with fluidity?
Do you feel ready to dive into the heart of Universal Prosperity?
In general, do you feel free in your life?
Do you appreciate each step of a project, as well as each day's activities?
Are you at peace with who you are and your life choices?
Do you allow love to fill you and flow within you before sharing it?
Are you in a romantic relationship? Yes:0/ No:10 (needs to change to the yes/no button)
Do you feel joy in sharing your life without needing to be in symbiosis?
Do you easily communicate the profound joy that lives within you with your family?
Do you enjoy preparing celebrations for others (birthdays, anniversaries, promotions, retirement, etc.)?
Do you receive new inspirations with lightness and in total openness?
Do you dive right into the unknown with courage and certitude?
Do you leave enough time and space for creativity in your life?
Are you ready to fully shine brightly, all the while being an instrument of the universe?
Have you stopped holding on to the need for the approval/recognition of others?
Do you allow vitality to flow within you with lightness?
Do you feel wonder and awe for the money that flows through you?
Do you feel free financially regardless of your assets?
Do you easily express care to your work colleagues, even if they don't think the same way you do?
Are you able to be detached from any specific tangible results to feel fulfilled?
Are you amazed to see the Universe at work, even if you're experiencing uncomfortable situations?
Are you ready to free yourself of your dreams, desires, and needs to be entirely satisfied?
